backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing products, sales, buyer info, access control, and inventory updates with CRUD and sale-recording APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old sale records into the new format by adding buyer and creator fields while preserving other data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing feature IDs, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for sales and dashboard functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining custom color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring TanStack Router, routes, theme provider, layout, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Adjust: UI dialog for adjusting product stock, currently showing a placeholder error due to missing backend method.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Delete: Confirmation dialog for deleting a product, showing an error because the backend delete method is not implemented.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Produc: Dialog component for creating or editing products with form state, validation, and createProduct mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, mobile nav, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboard.ts: Fetches dashboard summary data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides product list, single product lookup, and product creation via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSales.ts: Supports recording sales and fetching all sales or a single sale, with reactive query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions to format currency and timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/queryKeys.ts: Defines consistent React Query keys for products, sales, and dashboard.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up QueryClient, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI showing product totals, low‑stock counts, today's sales, and recent sales using data from dashboard and sales hooks.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Inventory management page with product list, search, and dialogs for adding, editing, adjusting stock, and deleting products.
frontend/src/pages/RecordSalePage.tsx: Form page for recording a sale with line items, buyer info, validations, and submission via the sales API hook.
frontend/src/pages/SalesHistoryPage.tsx: Displays sorted sales history with loading/error states and a selectable sale detail panel using sales and product data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, syncing them with sessionStorage, and manipulating hash‑based query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration setting dark mode, content paths, custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using several plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, feature list, and pending new feature requests related to implementing and displaying sales history functionality.
